dmca.title: [ABUSE] Fwd: Returned mail: see transcript for details
dmca.body:
NC

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 17, 2005 1:11 PM
To: Jeff Harper
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Fwd: Returned mail: see transcript for details

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


>>I had one of our users come to us today and show us a website that seems
>>to have completley stolen our web site design...  When dns'ing one of the
>>address the sites on I came up with theplanet.com ip.
>>
>>the site is:
>>
>>http://sl-apollo.servehttp.com/
>>
>>our website is:
>>
>>http://www.acmeshells.com
>>
>>
>>This is a direct rip off of our custom site and is in violation of our
>>copyright and the designers copyright.  Not to mention they are trying to
>>scam customers by asking for the credit card PIN # when they order (The
>>ONLY reason they could use this pin is to withdraw money off a credit
card.)
>>
>>ACMEShells requests the removal of this site until such time as they
>>remove our design, etc.
>>
>>
>>
>>Thank You.
>>
>>Jeff Harper
>>ACMEShells Owner/Admin
>>http://www.acmeshells.com
>>
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB7A3KvK/XpJs6oyURAhDqAKCqQgAcQePl66U2PXSoqEZMqdyEWgCfYI0U
aOIrHay+pbPgsG0d0TG3V04=
=GFNQ
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
